title: Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2023
content:
10th March, 2023 Statutory Instruments 65
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 8 OF 2023
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No. 35 of 2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government
By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll)
Order, 2023
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 125 of the
Electoral Process Act, 2016, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll)
Order, 2023.
2. A candidate for election as a Councillor in a district and Date and
ward set out in the Schedule shall lodge a nomination with the time of
nomination
Returning Officer on Thursday, 16th March, 2023, between 0900 for election
hours and 1500 hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Thursday, 16th Campaign
period
March, 2023, at 1500 hours and close at 1800 hours on Wednesday,
19th April, 2023.
4. (1) The poll for the election of a Councillor in a district Election date
and time of
and ward set out in the Schedule shall take place on Thursday,
poll
20th April, 2023, between 0600 hours and 1800 hours.
(2) A poll shall not be taken in a district and ward if only one
candidate is validly nominated.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K 4.00 each.
66 Statutory Instruments 10th March, 2023
SCHEDULE
(Paragraphs 2 and 4)
ELECTIONS FOR COUNCILLORS
District Constituency Ward No. Name
Serenje Serenje 101011013 Muchinda
Chililabombwe Chililabombwe 102001016 Chitimukulu
Lupososhi Lupososhi 107012005 Katilye
Made by the Electoral Commission of Zambia at Lusaka this 7th day of
March, 2023.
M. F. ZALOUMIS (MRS),
Chairperson
A. D. SIMWINGA,
Vice Chairperson
V. M. MUKANDA,
Member
N. M. MUTITI,
Member
M. E. CHIPENZI,
Member
LUSAKA
7th March, 2023
[EC.101/5/5 CONF.)
